** Welcome to Udio üéâ
------------------------------------------------------------

Ready to let your creative genius flow? We‚Äôre here to support you with easy-to-use music creation and editing tools.

Just type in a quick description of your idea and tap ‚ÄòCreate‚Äô to get started.
https://udio.com/create?utm_source=mailchimp&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=welcome&utm_content=welcome_email&utm_source=mailchimp&utm_campaign=welcome&utm_medium=email&mc_cid=94e745a68e&mc_eid=UNIQID

Pro tip: We recommend adding some descriptors (separated by commas) to guide the style of your song. Like ‚Äúmelodic, upbeat, happy‚Äù.

Can‚Äôt wait to hear your first track! And if you decide you‚Äôre ready to take your music production to the next level, you can upgrade your account to get access to additional features like:
https://www.udio.com/pricing?utm_source=mailchimp&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=welcome&utm_content=welcome_email&utm_source=mailchimp&utm_campaign=welcome&utm_medium=email&mc_cid=94e745a68e&mc_eid=UNIQID


** Advanced audio editing
------------------------------------------------------------

Get higher audio quality on all your projects, download stems of your tracks, edit single vocal lines, or regenerate specific sections of your songs.
https://www.udio.com/pricing?utm_source=mailchimp&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=welcome&utm_content=welcome_email&utm_source=mailchimp&utm_campaign=welcome&utm_medium=email&mc_cid=94e745a68e&mc_eid=UNIQID


** Use your own audio
------------------------------------------------------------

With a Standard or Pro account, you can upload your own audio files and use our premium editing tools to turn them into musical masterpieces. With a Pro membership, you can upload audio as a ‚ÄòStyle Reference‚Äô to create tracks with a similar sound.
https://www.udio.com/pricing?utm_source=mailchimp&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=welcome&utm_content=welcome_email&utm_source=mailchimp&utm_campaign=welcome&utm_medium=email&mc_cid=94e745a68e&mc_eid=UNIQID


** Create more, faster
------------------------------------------------------------

Get priority processing to produce your songs fast, create up to 8 tracks per prompt at the same time, and create thousands of songs per month. Also get first access to our new versions.
Start Creating (https://udio.com/create?utm_source=mailchimp&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=welcome&utm_content=welcome_email&utm_source=mailchimp&utm_campaign=welcome&utm_medium=email&mc_cid=94e745a68e&mc_eid=UNIQID)
